showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ table. The camp ground is very well maintained, has a good playground. One shower house for everyone, but it has great water pressure and water temps. Lots of things to do in the park to keep kids and adults happy and busy.  The camp ‚Ä¶

This park in a Cincinnati suburb is quite nice and very well operated and maintained. The shower house was clean and worked well.  The park is lakeside and has adequate spacing between sites.  Some of the park is heavily treed and some is ‚Ä¶
So pretty and clean. Was fun to ride our ebikes on their paved trail.  Shower area needs better ventilation and to be cleaner so it smells better.
Staying in space 1F with a class A RV and tent. Great for a weekend getaway. Clean, nice shower house, good walking trails.

showerReviews.reviewText: Beautiful  space for celebrating special occasions. We were there for a baby shower itbwas fabulous

My friends and I booked the gathering house for a baby shower. We thought the price was great, and the venue is super cute and great size for a small event. The first red flag of many is that they do not allow you to tour the facility and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Outdoor chairs,tables, arch's. These things are a lot to add onto a day. Over all if you want things to be stress free I would not suggest this place. I think it would be ok for a bridal shower or birthday

‚Ä¶ either of them no matter how far in advance you try. Nature trail, open areas for group activities, & a fairly good amount of parking make this a nice place to spend a sunny afternoon with the kiddos or host a scouting event or baby shower.
This was a lovely park.  The grounds looked nice and we'll kept. The gathering house was a perfect spot for a baby shower!!

showerReviews.reviewText: It was a very peaceful and safe to place to camp. The restroom and shower room was very clean and kept up several times during the day and night. They answered every question and was very polite. I'll be going back every year to camp.
Nice place. Lots of near by things to do, canoeing, boating, swimming & fishing.  Wolfe habitat, close to Wally World & Metamora.  Park is quite, playgrounds for kids, shower house. Will come back.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ . Is there shower houses and restrooms are always kept clean.. you can get on their website and pick your campsite and while doing so you can look at the pictures of it to get a glimpse of what it looks like before you book it. We ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . The restrooms and all are taken care of but the water.??!! Every time I allow kids to get into the water, even though we shower immediately after getting home, they get sick every single time. So if you just wanna wade and sun‚Ä¶. Great ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ SHOWER HOUSE/ RESTROOM - Flush Toilets with individual showers. However Not all of their shower houses are handicap accessible.  The loop we stayed in this past weekend the shower house may have had a handicap stalls, but the wheelchair ‚Ä¶

We love coming here every year, bathrooms/shower house are always clean.  Only bad thing is it takes 30 min to drive to their beautiful beach area. It really would be nice if they could put in one closer to the camping area. Highly ‚Ä¶

I went to this park with my church family. We had a wonderful time there. The staff was really nice as well. The grounds of the park were clean. I didn't use the shower area but I heard that area was really clean too. Thanks for everything!
‚Ä¶ The bathrooms and shower?! Disgusting. The toilet stall walls have calmed on boogers and other fluids. The stainless steel stalls don't look like they have been cleaned since COVID. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the site, trash everywhere, and peoples leftovers littered on the ground. Last people used the bathroom by a tree on the site even though there is a shower house in the loop. No camp host thought of cleaning it before new people camp in??? ‚Ä¶

Huge park!  Ideal for bike riding,  golf carting, boating, beach and hiking.  Only 2 play areas and bathrooms were shower house bathrooms combo.  It had no ventilation and it was miserable trying to shower.  The facilities were newer, just ‚Ä¶

I am somewhat disappointed in the restroom/shower facilities in campground C. Terrible showerheads. The park is large with activities all over. We are new to the State Park system so I'll keep my judgement light, üòÉ ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ able to get a loop with our friends. The bathhouse is pretty nice as well (just wish there was a place to hang shower items other than outside the actual shower or on the floor, that's my only issue but it's still nice and clean) and there ‚Ä¶
